about_the_game:
Katrina, a regular domestic cat, is mysteriously transported to New Marilyn City—a bizarre place filled with strange characters, twisted experiments, and secrets lurking in every corner. Now transformed into an anthropomorphic version of herself, Katrina must unravel the mysteries of this city, ruled by the enigmatic Mobb Paw and haunted by the sinister experiments of Dr. Schwein. Along the way, you'll encounter quirky, unforgettable allies and navigate eerie environments, solving puzzles and using your wits to outsmart cunning bosses. Will you help guide Katrina home, or will the city's darkness consume her?

Game Features

• A nostalgic, yet unsettling atmosphere with beautiful, vintage animations
• Outsmart your enemies using clever environmental clues and crafted tools
• Unravel Katrina's mysterious past while exploring poignant themes like mental health and animal welfare
• Test your mind in intricately designed levels and discover hidden secrets
• Collect materials to craft useful items that help you progress and outwit enemies
• Outsmart bosses with innovative tactics and puzzle-based solutions

name: CATATONIC GAME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

esrb.descriptors:
Cartoon Violence
Use of Alcohol
Use of Drugs

short_description: CATATONIC GAME is a narrative puzzle-platformer set in a 1930s-inspired rubber hose world. Play as Katrina, a lost cat navigating the eerie New Marilyn City. Outsmart bosses, solve puzzles, and uncover dark secrets in this surreal adventure.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
